content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Crude Oil Extraction Structure at position (17.5, 40.5)
Consists of a pumpjack at position (17.5, 40.5) and a storage tank at position (21.5, 41.5) connected via a pipe group at position (18.5, 38.5)

### Electricity Generator at position (8.5, 41.5)
Consists of a boiler at position (12.5, 41.0) and a steam engine at position (8.5, 41.5)

### Petroleum Gas Production Structure at position (26.5, 43.5)
Consists of an oil refinery at position (26.5, 43.5), a storage tank at position (31.5, 43.5) to store petroleum gas, and a pipe group at position (29.5, 40.5) connecting the oil refinery to the storage tank.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing entities due to collision with existing entities or unplaceable terrain
- Ensure that the target location is clear of other entities and is on a buildable terrain before attempting to place an entity.
- Consider adjusting the position or direction of placement to avoid collisions.

### Errors when placing entities next to other entities with specific spacing and direction
- Verify that the spacing and direction used for placing entities next to each other are valid and do not result in collisions with existing entities.
- Adjust the spacing or direction as needed to successfully place the entity.

### Errors when connecting entities without fluid in the source entity
- Ensure that the source entity has the required fluid before attempting to connect it to another entity that requires that fluid.

### Errors when inspecting inventory of entities that do not support inventory inspection
- Verify that the entity supports inventory inspection before attempting to inspect its inventory.

### Errors when entities are not receiving electricity
- Ensure that entities requiring electricity are properly connected to a power source.

## NAMESPACE

No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
